definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: You fixed me up with him six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前你曾替我和他牽過紅線。

sentences.english: All the important sentences in the article were picked out in red lines.
sentences.chinese: 文章中的所有重要句子均劃有紅線，使其突出。

sentences.english: One had coins attached with red strings and was put at the foot of children's beds.
sentences.chinese: 一種紅包是繫有紅線的硬幣，放在孩子的被窩裏。

sentences.english: Iterate this process, tying randomly chosen pairs of buttons together with red thread.
sentences.chinese: 重複這一過程，用紅線連接隨機選擇的鈕釦對。

sentences.english: Renting, particularly along the red line in northwest DC, is expensive.
sentences.chinese: 租金比較昂貴，特別是在特區西北部沿紅線地區。

sentences.english: This practice was called Real Estate Redlining and it was exposed thanks to aggregate data analysis.
sentences.chinese: 這叫做“房地產紅線”，這都要歸功於數據的分析。

sentences.english: Susie loves to play matchmaker. She's always introducing her single friends to each other.
sentences.chinese: 蘇西愛牽紅線，她經常介紹她的單身朋友互相認識。

sentences.english: But he said he did not dare cross this “untouchable red line.
sentences.chinese: 但是他說，他不敢“碰觸這條紅線”。

sentences.english: Redline of this engine is at 4200 RPM.
sentences.chinese: 紅線是這臺發動機在4200轉。

sentences.english: The check level, such as the lower than the upper line, then add some water.
sentences.chinese: 檢查液麪，如低於上部紅線時，則應補加純水。

sentences.english: On his finger, it is a red line.
sentences.chinese: 王洵的手指上出現了一條紅線。

sentences.english: Safety not to touch the red line, unsparing violation.
sentences.chinese: 安全紅線不能碰，違章違紀不留情。

sentences.english: Journalists acknowledge that they practice self-censorship and when necessary toe the party line.
sentences.chinese: 記者們承認他們會在觸及紅線之際履行自我審查之職。

sentences.english: Poems and wines seem inseparable in traditional Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 詩與酒，就像牽了紅線，似乎總是連在一起。

sentences.english: The red line is the demarcation line.
The lumbar vertebrae will show evidence of cartilage or at least as red line present on the tips.
sentences.chinese: 腰椎骨表明軟骨或至少在頂端有紅線出現。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
as the time draws near/at the last moment/temporary/interim/ad hoc
to detour/to bypass/to circumvent/to avoid/to wind around (of a road etc)
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
